abstract: When you hear about Apple, you mostly hear about the top executives like the late Steve Jobs, his early sidekick Steve Wozniak or the legendary designer Jony Ive. But you probably haven't heard much about Ken Segall, who worked for the ad agency responsible for Apple's "Think Different" campaign. He has tales to tell.

headline.main: One on One: Ken Segall, the Man Who Put the 'i' in iMac
